citations.narrative:
The facility was found to be exhibiting animals to the public without a valid USDA license. This is a violation of
section 2.1. No covered activity is permitted without a valid USDA license.
Exit interview conducted with the owner.

narrative:
2.1(a)
REQUIREMENTS AND APPLICATION.
The facility was found to be exhibiting animals to the public without a valid USDA license.  This is a violation of
section 2.1.  No covered activity is permitted without a valid USDA license.
Exit interview conducted with the owner.
